languages.text: "О да! Я добыл его в Разломах Гекатона, где мы схлестнулись с {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносами{/g}. Они тогда крепко решили добраться до моей глотки, и, клянусь Безбожными звездами, у них почти получилось". {n}Каллигос говорит с такой радостью, будто это был лучший день в его жизни.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "О да! Я добыл его в Разломах Гекатона, где мы схлестнулись с ксеносами. Они тогда крепко решили добраться до моей глотки, и, клянусь Безбожными звездами, у них почти получилось". {n}Каллигос говорит с такой радостью, будто это был лучший день в его жизни.{/n}

languages.text: "Oh yes! I claimed it in the Rifts of Hecaton, where we had a clash with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. They were really trying to get to my throat, and, by the Heathen Stars, they almost succeeded." {n}Calligos is speaking with such joy, it is as though he is recounting the best day of his life.{/n}
languages.original_text: "О да! Я добыл его в Разломах Гекатона, где мы схлестнулись с {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносами{/g}. Они тогда крепко решили добраться до моей глотки, и, клянусь Безбожными звездами, у них почти получилось". {n}Каллигос говорит с такой радостью, будто это был лучший день в его жизни.{/n}

They were really trying to get to my throat, and, by the Heathen Stars, they almost succeeded." {n}Calligos is speaking with such joy, it is as though he is recounting the best day of his life.{/n}

languages.text: 「もちろんだとも！そいつは俺らが{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}と戦闘した場所、ヘカトンの裂け目で得たものだ。奴らは本気で俺の首を落とそうとしてきた。異教に歌われし星々によって、それがもう叶うというところまできた」{n}カリゴスは大喜びで語っている。まるで人生最高の日を物語っているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh yes! I claimed it in the Rifts of Hecaton, where we had a clash with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. They were really trying to get to my throat, and, by the Heathen Stars, they almost succeeded." {n}Calligos is speaking with such joy, it is as though he is recounting the best day of his life.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんだとも！そいつは俺らが{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}と戦闘した場所、ヘカトンの裂け目で得たものだ。奴らは本気で俺の首を落とそうとしてきた。異教に歌われし星々によって、それがもう叶うというところまできた」{n}カリゴスは大喜びで語っている。まるで人生最高の日を物語っているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: “来头可不小！它是我从在赫卡顿断带弄到手的。当时，我们和{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}发生了冲突，那群家伙是真的想要我的命。异端群星在上，他们差点就得手了。”{n}卡里戈斯眉飞色舞地讲述着惊险的故事，仿佛那是他这一生中最美好的回忆。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh yes! I claimed it in the Rifts of Hecaton, where we had a clash with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. They were really trying to get to my throat, and, by the Heathen Stars, they almost succeeded." {n}Calligos is speaking with such joy, it is as though he is recounting the best day of his life.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “来头可不小！它是我从在赫卡顿断带弄到手的。当时，我们和{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}发生了冲突，那群家伙是真的想要我的命。异端群星在上，他们差点就得手了。”{n}卡里戈斯眉飞色舞地讲述着惊险的故事，仿佛那是他这一生中最美好的回忆。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Desde luego! Me hice con esta cosa en las Brechas de Hecaton, durante una batalla con {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Querían cobrarse mi vida y, por las Estrellas Paganas, casi lo consiguieron». {n}Calligos habla alegremente de lo sucedido, como si te contara el mejor día de su vida.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh yes! I claimed it in the Rifts of Hecaton, where we had a clash with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. They were really trying to get to my throat, and, by the Heathen Stars, they almost succeeded." {n}Calligos is speaking with such joy, it is as though he is recounting the best day of his life.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Desde luego! Me hice con esta cosa en las Brechas de Hecaton, durante una batalla con {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. Querían cobrarse mi vida y, por las Estrellas Paganas, casi lo consiguieron». {n}Calligos habla alegremente de lo sucedido, como si te contara el mejor día de su vida.{/n}

languages.text: « Oh oui ! Je l'ai récupéré dans les Grands Récifs d'Hecaton, après un affrontement contre des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}. Ils avaient la ferme intention de me faire la peau et, par les Étoiles Athées, ils ont failli réussir. » {n}Calligos relate les événements sur un ton enjoué, comme s'il s'agissait du plus beau jour de sa vie.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh yes! I claimed it in the Rifts of Hecaton, where we had a clash with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. They were really trying to get to my throat, and, by the Heathen Stars, they almost succeeded." {n}Calligos is speaking with such joy, it is as though he is recounting the best day of his life.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Oh oui ! Je l'ai récupéré dans les Grands Récifs d'Hecaton, après un affrontement contre des {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}. Ils avaient la ferme intention de me faire la peau et, par les Étoiles Athées, ils ont failli réussir. » {n}Calligos relate les événements sur un ton enjoué, comme s'il s'agissait du plus beau jour de sa vie.{/n}

languages.text: "Oh, ja! Ich erhielt es in den Rissen von Hecaton, wo wir einen Zusammenstoß mit {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} hatten. Sie wollten mir wirklich an die Kehle, und bei den Sternen der Ungläubigen, sie hätten es fast geschafft." {n}Calligos berichtet mit solcher Freude, dass man meinen könnte, es ginge um den besten Tag seines Lebens.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh yes! I claimed it in the Rifts of Hecaton, where we had a clash with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. They were really trying to get to my throat, and, by the Heathen Stars, they almost succeeded." {n}Calligos is speaking with such joy, it is as though he is recounting the best day of his life.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Oh, ja! Ich erhielt es in den Rissen von Hecaton, wo wir einen Zusammenstoß mit {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} hatten. Sie wollten mir wirklich an die Kehle, und bei den Sternen der Ungläubigen, sie hätten es fast geschafft." {n}Calligos berichtet mit solcher Freude, dass man meinen könnte, es ginge um den besten Tag seines Lebens.{/n}

languages.text: "Olmaz mı? {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zenolar{/g} ile çarpıştığımız Hecaton Yarıkları'ndan aldım bunu. Zenolar pekmezimi akıtmaya çalışıyorlardı, Küffar Yıldızlar alasıcalar neredeyse başarıyordu hatta." {n}Calligos öyle şevkle konuşuyor ki sanki hayatının en güzel gününü anlatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Oh yes! I claimed it in the Rifts of Hecaton, where we had a clash with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}. They were really trying to get to my throat, and, by the Heathen Stars, they almost succeeded." {n}Calligos is speaking with such joy, it is as though he is recounting the best day of his life.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Olmaz mı? {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zenolar{/g} ile çarpıştığımız Hecaton Yarıkları'ndan aldım bunu. Zenolar pekmezimi akıtmaya çalışıyorlardı, Küffar Yıldızlar alsın neredeyse başarıyorlardı da." {n}Calligos öyle şevkle konuşuyor ki sanki hayatının en güzel gününü anlatıyor.{/n}
